text: Q31. Consider the following statements select the correct one: (i) If the frequencies of the letters a, b, c are equal, then a = 01, b = 10, c=11,d = 00 is a valid Huffman code. (i) Adding an edge to a directed graph can decrease the number of strongly connected components by at most 1. (a) i only (b) ii only (c) Both (d) None
